name: N.E.O
description:
The only way to get stronger is to practice your skills!
An action RPG with action gameplay unlike any other treasure hunter game using a direct control style.
Preface
An accident occurs during a terraforming project on an isolated planet.
The protagonist Issac who goes to investigate is attacked by something during landing.
His ship crashes on rough red earth.
Issac with his partner Chobi need to find a path to escape from this unknown planet.
But while searching for clues, animal-like killing machines suddenly appear.
What happened on this planet?
A human and creature is left stranded on this unknown terrain.
On a planet that is not Earth the battle to survive begins to unfold.
